title: Infect
desc: Infect all in a circle, can use once per day

title: Sneeze
desc: infected human in a circle create area that would infect others

title: Touch
desc: infected ones in a circle would infect next 3 uninfected he touches

title: Infect Bin
desc: Infect garbage bin in a circle

title: Explode Bin
desc: infect a big area around a garbage bin

title: Explode Human
desc: infect a small area around an infected human

title: Explode Animal
desc: infect a small area around an infected human

title: Summon Mushroom
desc: if there are human, animal and bin in an area, summon mushroom

title: Teleport
desc: teleport a random infected human to an area

title: Attract
desc: animals in an area would attract not infected human
